revision.text:
{{OpenGL}} [[GZDoom]] and [[Zandronum]] both support natively three different types of model formats. * [[DMD]] (originating from [[Doomsday]]) * [[MD2]] (originating from {{wp|Quake_II|Quake II}}) * [[MD3]] (originating from {{wp|Quake_III_Arena|Quake III Arena}})
[[GZDoom]] supports the following additional model formats: * [[3D]] (originating from {{wp|Unreal (1998 video game)|Unreal Engine 1}}) * [[OBJ]] (standard Wavefront .obj models) * [[IQM]] (binary Skeletal format supported by various games/source ports like [https://ioquake3.org/ ioquake3])
==See also== * [[MODELDEF]]
[[Category:Data formats]] [[Category:Model formats|*]]
